abstract: The company’s recent announcement of a large-scale security breach has many people asking questions.
snippet: The company’s recent announcement of a large-scale security breach has many people asking questions.
lead_paragraph: Q. I have a Yahoo account. I have changed the password and taken other recommended security steps but I have yet to hear from Yahoo. Does the company have any obligation to inform its users of the breach? Shouldn’t Yahoo have been the first to send out information instead of letting us find out about the hacking from the news?

headline.main: Still Waiting to Hear From Yahoo
headline.print_headline: Still Waiting to Hear From Yahoo
